title: Power calculator global configuration
description:
Global settings file for the power calculator application.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

items.description:
Part of the path to a file or folder.
Available variables:
$SourceCodeRootPath - to refer to the root of the source code.
$DropboxRootPath - to refer to the Dropbox folder (if it exists).

Data.description: The folder from which all relative paths are calculated.

Medium.description: Medium will be loaded from .fluid and .solid files at the '${DataPath}\${MediumPath}' path.

Result.description: Results will be placed in the '${DataPath}\${ResultPath}' path.

Log.description: Log files can be directed to the '${DataPath}\${LogPath}' path.

Transducer.description: The path to the folder and file where the transducer settings are stored relative to the ${DataPath} path.

Preset.description: The path to the folder and file where the presets are stored. This path is relative to the ${DataPath} path.

Surface.description: The path to the folder and file where the surfaces are stored. This path is relative to the ${DataPath} path.

Volume.description: The path to the folder and file where the volumes are stored. This path is relative to the ${DataPath} path.
